ch0100_90_kyohei/0101_0701_02_10:
Come on, let’s go have some more Pokémon
battles today!
ch0100_90_kyohei/7101_0701_01_10:
My Haxorus is a little different from the ones you
usually see—he’s special!
ch0100_90_kyohei/7101_0701_02_10:
He’s got a really cool, stylish look to him. He’s just
the best!
ch0100_90_kyohei/7102_0701_01_10:
Isn’t this outfit awesome?! I feel like the main
character in a Pokéstar Studios movie!
ch0100_90_kyohei/7102_0701_02_10:
Though, if I were in a Pokéstar Studios movie,
what do you suppose the story would be?
ch0100_90_kyohei/7103_0701_01_10: I’ve gotten stronger since coming to Pasio...
ch0100_90_kyohei/7103_0701_02_10:
But Rosa’s improved just as much! I guess I really
shouldn’t be surprised!
ch0100_90_kyohei/7103_0701_03_10:
As a Neo Champion, I’m gonna work as hard as I
can to keep up with Rosa, you, and everyone else!
ch0100_90_kyohei/7104_0701_01_10:
Dragon tamers are all so amazing—I can’t help
but admire them!
ch0100_90_kyohei/7104_0701_02_10:
I mean, just catching and raising dragon Pokémon
is really, REALLY difficult!
ch0100_90_kyohei/7104_0701_03_10:
And those outfits they wear... Not everyone can
pull off that look, you know!
ch0100_90_kyohei/7105_0701_01_10:
Do you have a special Pokémon,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0100_90_kyohei/7105_0701_02_10:
It could be a rare Pokémon, or one you share fond
memories with, or one you’re especially close to...
I think all Pokémon are special in some way.
ch0100_90_kyohei/7105_0701_03_10:
Anyway, if you’ve got a special Pokémon, let’s
have it and my Haxorus battle each other!
ch0100_90_kyohei/7105_0701_04_10: We’ll see which kind of “special” is the strongest!
ch0100_90_kyohei/1701_0701_01_10:
Oh, there you are! There’s something I wanted to
give you!
ch0100_90_kyohei/1701_0701_02_10:
This is just a thank-you for always hanging out
with me!
ch0100_90_kyohei/1701_0702_01_10:
Heh heh... Please keep hanging out with me from
now on, as well!
ch0100_90_kyohei/2501_0701_01_10:
Hey! Did you know there are special places that
aren’t open to just any old Trainer?
ch0100_90_kyohei/2501_0701_02_10:
Only a handful of Trainers are allowed inside!
Sounds exciting, don’t you think?
ch0100_90_kyohei/2501_0702_01_10:
I bet there are lots of places around the world that
regular people can’t get into...
ch0100_90_kyohei/2501_0702_02_10:
If I keep getting stronger and learn even more
about Pokémon, do you think I’ll be allowed in?
ch0100_90_kyohei/2501_0702_03_10:
When that day comes, let’s go on an adventure
together!
ch0100_90_kyohei/2511_0701_01_10:
As strong as we are now, I bet the two of us
could get a whole lot of wins at the Battle
Subway in Unova.
ch0100_90_kyohei/2511_0701_02_10:
Pokémon-fan synergy can create a combination
that’s better than perfect! Together, we could even
take on the Subway Bosses!
ch0100_90_kyohei/2511_0702_01_10:
I’ve heard that there are places like the Battle
Subway in other regions, too, where you can go
to have Pokémon battles!
ch0100_90_kyohei/2511_0702_02_10: I bet there are lots of really strong Trainers there!
ch0100_90_kyohei/2511_0702_03_10:
Maybe we should have a competition to see which
one of us can win at the most different facilities!
ch0100_90_kyohei/3001_0701_01_10: Morning! I wonder what’s waiting for us today!
ch0100_90_kyohei/3003_0701_01_10:
There’s so many strong people in the world!
I gotta make sure to train properly!
ch0100_90_kyohei/3005_0701_01_10:
You’re up late! If there’s anything I can help you
with, just ask!
